{"id":950287479,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 month, 2 weeks","timestamp":1684079175,"status":14,"status_display":"Time Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/950287479/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Power of Heroes","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n       int mod=1000000007;\n    public int sumOfPower(int[] nums) {\n        int[] dp= new int[nums.length+1];\n        Arrays.fill(dp,-1);\n        return help(nums,0,Integer.MIN_VALUE,Integer.MAX_VALUE,dp);\n        \n    }\n    public int help(int[] nums,int idx,int max,int min,int[] dp){\n        if(idx==nums.length){\n            return max*max*min;\n        }\n      \n        \n        int dont=help(nums,idx+1,max, min,dp);\n        if(max==Integer.MIN_VALUE){\n            max=nums[idx];\n        }\n        if(min==Integer.MIN_VALUE){\n            min=nums[idx];\n        }\n        if(nums[idx]>max){\n            max=nums[idx];\n        }\n        if(nums[idx]<min){\n            min=nums[idx];\n        }\n        int include=help(nums,idx+1,max,min,dp);\n        return dp[idx] =(include+dont)%mod;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"power-of-heroes","has_notes":false}
